name: protocol
author: Mozilla
description: A design system for Mozilla's websites.

scripts.build-package: npm install && npm run lint && npm run webpack-package
scripts.build-docs: webpack --config webpack.docs.static.config.js --mode production && webpack --config webpack.docs.build.config.js --mode production && fractal build
scripts.lint: npm run lint-js && npm run lint-css
scripts.webpack-docs: npm run lint && webpack --config webpack.docs.static.config.js --mode development && webpack --config webpack.docs.build.config.js --watch --mode development
scripts.webpack-package: webpack --config webpack.package.static.config.js --mode production && webpack --config webpack.package.build.config.js --mode production
